<letter id="anp3901">
<recipient first="John" last="Irvine" type="individual"/>
<p>
<a rel="month origin" value="2">FEBRUARY</a> <a rel='day origin' value='20'>20</a>, <a href='/results.php?year=1779' rel="origin">1779</a>: 
</p><p>
SIR : You are hereby desired to be at White Hall on Wednesday next with one third of your Company they to be horsemen and one 
Lieutenant, and one other third of your Company to continue at White Hall until further orders. You will receive further orders on that day, 
</p><p>
I am, sir, your most humble servant, 
</p><p>
<a href="/results.php?tla=anp" rel="me">ANDREW PICKENS</a>.  
</p>
</letter>
